creator: johannes+bugs@truschnigg.info
text: mod_autoindex features the "IndexHeadInsert" directive to inject custom markup into automatically generated Index pages. According to the Apache httpd changelogs, this options first appeared in Version 2.2.11 (http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/CHANGES_2.2.11). The documentation of mod_autoindex for 2.2 (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_autoindex.html#indexheadinsert) does not hint at that, and users of minor versions (like everyone on Debian Stable w/ Apache 2.2.9, for example) will end up with HTTP Error 500 (or worse) when trying to make use of that specific feature.

creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text:
Thanks for the report.
Fixed in r781422
